language.title: Language
language.subtitle: Choose the language for the dashboard interface.

invoiceSettings.tip: Tip: You can enable both product tax and invoice tax at the same time.
invoiceSettings.title: Invoice preferences
invoiceSettings.subtitle: Configure taxes for products and invoices.

productTax.title: Product tax
productTax.subtitle: Adds a percent tax per product line.

invoiceTax.title: Invoice tax / fee
invoiceTax.subtitle: Adds fixed amount and/or percent to the invoice total.

errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.TICKETS_PROVIDER_ID_REQUIRED_FOR_ADMIN: providerId is required when an admin creates a ticket.
errors.TICKETS_ONLY_ADMIN_OR_PROVIDER: Only admin or provider can create tickets.
errors.TICKETS_FORBIDDEN: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.TICKETS_SCHEDULE_CONFLICT: This employee already has a ticket scheduled at that time.
errors.TICKETS_CANNOT_CHANGE_COMPLETED: Cannot change status of a completed ticket.
errors.SCOPE_TITLE_MIN_LENGTH: Title must be at least {{min}} characters.
errors.AUTH_NEW_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: New password must be at least {{min}} characters long.
errors.AUTH_NEW_PASSWORD_SAME_AS_CURRENT: New password must be different from the current password.
errors.AUTH_RESET_PASSWORD_TOKEN_EXPIRED: This reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.AUTH_RESET_PASSWORD_PASSWORD_WEAK: Password does not meet security requirements
errors.AUTH_RESET_PASSWORD_SAME_AS_OLD: New password must be different from the previous one
errors.AUTH_PASSWORD_SAME_AS_CURRENT: New password must be different from the previous one
errors.USERS_ONLY_ADMIN_OR_PROVIDER_CREATE: Only admin or provider can create users.
errors.USERS_ONLY_ADMIN_PATCH_ACTIVE: Only admin can change user active status.
errors.USERS_PHONE_IN_USE: This phone number is already in use.
errors.USERS_USERNAME_IN_USE: This username is already in use.
errors.USERS_UNIQUE_CONSTRAINT: One or more fields must be unique.
errors.INVOICE_SETTINGS_INVALID_PRODUCT_TAX_PER: Product tax percent must be between {{min}} and {{max}}.
errors.INVOICE_SETTINGS_INVALID_INVOICE_TAX_PER: Invoice tax percent must be between {{min}} and {{max}}.
errors.INVOICE_SETTINGS_INVALID_INVOICE_TAX_FIX: Invoice fixed amount must be at least {{min}}.
errors.UPLOADS_FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large. Max size is {{maxMb}} MB.
errors.UPLOADS_TOO_MANY_FILES: Too many files. Max allowed is {{max}}.
